name: PRD to Asana Project
description: Parse a Product Requirements Document and automatically create Asana tasks

fields.name: prdUrl
fields.label: PRD Document URL
fields.help: Google Docs, Notion, or other accessible URL

fields.name: prdText
fields.label: Or Paste PRD Text
fields.placeholder: Paste the full PRD content here...
fields.help: If no URL provided, paste the document text

fields.name: asanaProject
fields.label: Asana Project
fields.help: Will be created if it doesn't exist

fields.name: breakdownLevel
fields.label: Task Breakdown Level
fields.help: How granularly to break down the PRD

fields.name: projectDuration
fields.label: Project Duration (weeks)
fields.help: AI will estimate task timelines within this window

fields.name: defaultAssignee
fields.label: Default Assignee (email)
fields.help: Optional: assign all tasks to this person by default

fields.name: addDependencies
fields.label: Add Task Dependencies
fields.help: AI will identify and set up task dependencies

fields.name: addMilestones
fields.label: Create Milestones
fields.help: Create milestone markers for key deliverables

fields.name: estimateEffort
fields.label: Estimate Effort
fields.help: AI estimates time/effort for each task
